QuestData.Title: A Royal Treat
QuestData.Description: So nice to see you again. I've got a special request for you.$B$BThe Winter Queen herself used to tend directly to groves, in the early times. Everything she touched burst with life and power. Even the ground she walked on.$b$BOver time, the Queen's Garden came to be known as the Garden of Night, for the Queen had not tended to her garden in so long.$b$BBut the ground is still potent with her power. It's the finest meal I've ever had. I know this is indulgent, but you and I both know I deserve it!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Royal Peat in the Garden of Night.
QuestData.RewardText: Feel how luxurious the soil is! I'm going to savor this for a while. Thank you.
